sub_title: Senior consultant (TA and evaluations) on international nutrition and food security/livelihoods
summary: I am a Nutrition and Food Security - Evaluator - Technical Advisor with a focus on development and humanitarian assistance. I hold Masters degrees in Human Nutrition from Wageningen University (WUR) and Strategic Management from Erasmus University Rotterdam (EUR). Through my work experience I've gained senior experience as team leader, and a long track record in undertaking external reviews and evaluations, and on management and provision of technical support on policy and programmatic aspects and for capacity development. Working for many years on international assignments, as consultant or part of an agency, has enriched me with great cross-cultural competence and broad knowledge on multisectoral approaches for improving nutrition.

education.field_of_study: Business Science with major in Strategic Management (with Distinction)
Human Nutrition; Nutritional Epidemiology; Home Economics; Medical anthropology; Sociology research

profile_positions.description: Leading on the design and implementation of the Country Strategic Plan Bhutan evaluation commissioned by WFP's central evaluation unit, including provision of operational and technical guidance to the team members. Undertaking the evaluation of WFP's support on nutrition and SBCC (upstream and downstream), rice fortification, and disaster analysis and disaster risk management.
profile_positions.title: WFP CSPE Bhutan - Team leader

profile_positions.description: Covering evaluation of the elements within the WFP Nepal country strategy plan 2019-2023 on food security, nutrition, school feeding and social protection, plus cross-cutting dimensions of GEDSI, humanitarian principles, protection, and accountability to affected populations mechanisms.
profile_positions.title: WFP CSPE Nepal - Senior Evaluator

profile_positions.description: Mid-Term Evaluation of the ‘Partnership for Improving Nutrition in Timor-Leste’ (PINTL) programme composed of a Budget Support element to the GoTL and a Complementary Action component on TA by UNICEF, based on the OECD/DAC Comprehensive Evaluation Framework for Budget Support programmes. Tasks entail a reconstruction of the Intervention Logic, assessment of mid-term results with analysis of driving/hindering factors, and identification of options for improvements within the remainder of  PINTL and for future EC assistance on nutrition in Timor-Leste.
profile_positions.title: EUD - MTE PINTL (Partnership for Improving Nutrition in Timor-Leste)

profile_positions.description: Technical leadership and management of the Technical Assistance to Strengthen Capacities (TASC) project, as part of the broader FCDO Technical Assistance for Nutrition programme. Management of technical and operational delivery of a portfolio of assignments under the component on TA requests from FCDO.
profile_positions.title: TASC Technical Team lead and Component Lead for TA requests from FCDO

profile_positions.description: Lead and co-implement the analysis of the impacts of COVID-19 pandemic on 7 GIZ Food and Nutrition Security Country Packages (India, Ethiopia, Malawi, Madagascar, Togo, Benin, Burkina Faso), based on a structured assessment tool, and provision of demand-based technical assistance. Deliverables include a set of country sheets and a summary report.
profile_positions.title: Team leader Analysis of COVID-19 on FNS and technical support
